summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing contracts with the State of Washington Interagency Committee on Outdoor Recreation for a grant to aid in acquisition or development of certain lands as permanent open space for recreational uses. (Project Nos. 69-012A - North Greenwood Playground; 69-020A - Mini Park Program (Belmont, Firehouse, Thomas and Spruce Parks); 69-018A - Chittenden Locks Waterfront Park; 69-019A - Matthews Beach Park and Boat Ramp; 69-080A - Mini Park Program (Harrison, Spring Street and 30th Avenues Parks); 69-075A - Beacon Hill Playfield; and 69-076D - Lake Washington Boulevard Bicycle Path).
